titleStmt.title: A nevv vvonder, a woman never vext A pleasant conceited comedy: sundry times acted: never before printed. Written by VVilliam Rowley, one of his Maiesties servants.
titleStmt.author: Rowley, William, 1585?-1642?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by G[eorge] P[urslowe] for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Crane in Saint Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: With a tail-piece on L2r. Variant: lacking tail-piece.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
